attributes.action: Close education facilities as it’s basically the same as mixing households!
attributes.additional_details: As Boris said there shouldn’t be mixing of households, if we’re sending our children to school this is basically the same thing as mixing households, the government should shutdown education facilities so it can prevent the increase of COVID-19 and open schools at an reasonable time.
attributes.background: Consider shutting down schools, colleges etc...

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383
